budget.title: Full-Day History on a Budget with Local Food
budget.summary: Explore Timisoara's main historical squares and fortifications with cheap but authentic local dishes.

schedule.title: Union Square warm-up
schedule.description: Start at Union Square, walk around the Baroque buildings and visit the Serbian and Catholic cathedrals.

schedule.title: Revolution walk in Victory Square
schedule.description: Head to Victory Square and follow the story of the 1989 Revolution around the Opera and Orthodox Cathedral.

schedule.title: Budget local lunch
schedule.description: Eat at a simple traditional restaurant, choosing dishes like sarmale, ciorba or goulash from the daily menu.

schedule.title: Bastion Theresia and old walls
schedule.description: Walk to Bastion Theresia and explore the remaining Habsburg fortifications and nearby historical streets.

schedule.title: Evening beer in the center
schedule.description: Finish with a local beer on a terrace in the old town, keeping it affordable but atmospheric.

comfortable.title: Full-Day Deep History with Comfort Local Dining
comfortable.summary: A full history-focused day with guided visits and higher quality local restaurants.

schedule.title: Guided Union Square tour
schedule.description: Start with a guided walk around Union Square, visiting both cathedrals and learning about Habsburg Timisoara.

schedule.title: History museum stop
schedule.description: Visit a local history or Revolution museum near the central area for more context on the city.

schedule.title: Traditional lunch with comfort
schedule.description: Have lunch at a well-rated traditional restaurant, trying several local specialties and a dessert.

schedule.title: Bastion and heritage streets
schedule.description: Explore Bastion Theresia and walk through nearby heritage streets with old architecture and hidden courtyards.

schedule.title: Craft beer and relaxed dinner
schedule.description: End with a relaxed evening in a craft beer bar or cozy restaurant in the old town.

budget.title: Full-Day History on a Budget with Light and Veggie Options
budget.summary: Historical highlights with lighter, vegetarian friendly choices that do not break the budget.

schedule.title: Union Square and cathedrals
schedule.description: Walk Union Square, visit the main churches and take in the early morning calm.

schedule.title: Revolution landmarks
schedule.description: Move to Victory Square and trace key points of the 1989 Revolution using plaques and monuments as a guide.

schedule.title: Simple light lunch
schedule.description: Choose a cafe or bistro with salads, soups and vegetarian options close to the center.

schedule.title: Bastion and city walls
schedule.description: Visit Bastion Theresia and walk around the remaining fortification lines and nearby streets.

schedule.title: Evening drink and snacks
schedule.description: End with a drink and light bar snacks at a central terrace that offers some veggie choices.

comfortable.title: Full-Day History with Comfortable Veggie-Friendly Dining
comfortable.summary: Historic sites combined with nicer cafes and restaurants that cater well to lighter or vegetarian diets.

schedule.title: Historic core introduction
schedule.description: Start with a slow walk around Union Square, visiting the cathedrals and nearby historical buildings.

schedule.title: Museum and coffee break
schedule.description: Visit a central museum and pause for specialty coffee and a small snack in a stylish cafe.

schedule.title: Modern bistro lunch
schedule.description: Eat in a modern bistro that offers vegetarian bowls, soups and lighter Romanian inspired dishes.

schedule.title: Bastion and city walk
schedule.description: Head to Bastion Theresia, then wander through nearby historic streets and courtyards.

schedule.title: Wine bar or craft beer stop
schedule.description: Finish in a wine bar or craft beer spot with some light sharing plates or cheese platters.

budget.summary: Classic history route plus cheap chances to taste a bit of everything.

schedule.title: Union Square overview

schedule.title: Victory Square and Revolution spots

schedule.title: Mixed budget lunch
schedule.description: Pick a modest restaurant or canteen style place and order a mix of local dishes to share.

schedule.title: Bastion and side streets
schedule.description: Visit Bastion Theresia and use the afternoon to explore a few lesser known side streets and courtyards.

schedule.title: Street snacks and beer
